byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Brit pub and radio comment on German leaflet raids

headline.main: Nazi Air Raid Leaflets Bring Good Prices; British Officials Unable to Obtain Copies

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 2--Farmers and other residents of South and Southwest England and Wales who looked up along the beams of searchlights early this morning and saw clouds of leaflets fluttering down are now in possession of Hitlerian documents that eventually may exceed in value first-edition copies of Mein Kampf.
